| üßÆ Statistics & data science
| üíä Clinical trials & aging & drug development
| üíª R enthusiast
| üë©‚Äçüíª Statistician \@ [loyal.com](https://loyal.com/)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm a **(bio)statistician/data scientist**(/whatever you want to call it) working in **aging, clinical trials** and **drug development**.

I have been doing applied statistics for almost a decade now (yeesh time flies), covering a variety of areas like, epidemiology, occupational health, circadian rhythms, actigraphy, depression & substance use.

Right now, my statistical interests include: everything Rstats, longitudinal data analysis, simulation-based power analysis, and survival analysis.

I'm also a mom of twins üëØ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è who loves horror movies üé• and is currently obsessed with Skyrim üßô.

## Skills

-   **Statistical programming**: R (expert), Python (proficient), SAS (trained in, but rarely use)

-   **Statistical methods**: Longitudinal data analysis, study design & power, survival analysis, unsupervised learning

-   **Professional**: Regulatory & academic report writing, cross-functional teams, stats communication

## Education

I have an **MS** in both **Biostatistics** (2018) and **Epidemiology** (2020) from the University of Pittsburgh, Graduate School of Public Health.

## Work Experience

**Statistics Manager, Research**\
*Loyal \| 2021-Present\
*(Data Scientist $\to$ Senior Data Scientist $\to$ Senior Statistician $\to$ Statistics Manager)

**Statistician** *\
University of Pittsburgh Medical Center \| 2020-2021*

**Graduate Student & Researcher in Biostatistics & Epidemiology**\
*Graduate School of Public Health, University of Pittsburgh \| 2016-2020*

**Staff Biostatistician\
***Center for Occupational Biostatistics and Epidemiology \| 2017-2018*

## Service

Associate Editor for Frontiers in Veterinary Science, Veterinary Surgery Section *\|* *2025*

## Helpful resources

-   Csik, Samantha. 2022.¬†‚Äú[**Adding a Blog to Your Existing Quarto Website**.](https://samanthacsik.github.io/posts/2022-10-24-quarto-blogs/)‚Äù¬†

-   Rapp, Albert. 2022. "[**The ultimate guide to starting a Quarto blog**.](https://albert-rapp.de/posts/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide.html)"
